member.name: IMFQualityAdvise2.NotifyQualityEvent
member.summary: Forwards an MEQualityNotify event from the media sink.
member.param: A pointer to the event's interface.
Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFQualityAdvise2
member.summary: Enables a pipeline object to adjust its own audio or video quality, in response to quality messages.
